DESTINY CALLS EUPHORIA

DESTINY CALLS EUPHORIA is a linear kinetic visual novel game. The story of a young man who choose to settle with life's circumstance comes to a shift when he decides to seek something meaningful. His search for happiness soon reveals secret dangers the world faces, and truths about himself.

After a chance encounter with a young Knowledge Seeker and a rare powerful stone, known as a Magnia Fragment, Nolan decides to seek out what more is out there for him. What lies before is an entanglement in a great scheme for power. His story has only just begun.

_______________________________________________________________

EPISODE 1

Nolan Serrano has been living in Fanal, slaying demons protecting the town for a living. His simple life comes into question after he's forced into task leads to an unexpected discovery.
